name: Adobe PreRelease (Dark!)
description: A dark theme for the Adobe PreRelease Forums that's easier on the eyes!  ;)
additional_info:
Feel free to modify as desired.  Note the background colors (222, 333, 444) to decipher what targets what.
The 1st section applies to most of the site.    
The 2nd section, while the target looks lengthy, is only targeting the highlight for already-read forum threads in the discussion list.
The 3rd section targets highlighted areas (search forms, message banners, pop-ups and drop-downs).
The 4th section targets a couple title texts.
The 5th section targets thread view counts in the discussion list.
The 6th section forces already-read threads in the list to 100% opacity (from the originally set 90%).
